QuestData.Title: The Ohn'ahran Plains Tour
QuestData.Description:
Ah, the Ohn'ahran Plains. Wide open spaces, gusting winds, endless vistas... and more race courses!
Just as in the Waking Shores, if you find any of my bronze colleagues, speak to them about their race course.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly each of the race courses in the Ohn'ahran Plains.
